signUp.getStartedText: Confirm your password and details to get started.

notifications.subHeading: Could we have your permission to send notifications, please? Our app uses notifications to remind you if we need more information to serve you and to help with your experience.

quiz.quiz_success_description: You've successfully completed the quiz. Please proceed with your application in order to open your live trading account.

application.personal_details_name: Select account type, Enter first name, middle name & last name.
application.personal_details_address: Enter your address, state, city & zipcode
application.personal_details_country: Share phone number and country details.
application.personal_details_step2_description:
Share the partner's details
Select the most suitable options.
application.which_other_brokers: Which other brokers are you currently working with?
application.what_region: What region will most of your clients come from?
application.how_may_clients: How many clients will you refer each month?
application.what_type_business: What type of business are you opening?
application.main_refferal_site: What is your main referral website URL or channel?
application.brief_description_business: Please give a brief description of your business.
application.provide_info_desc: Provide information regarding how will you publicly represent BlackBull Markets. Specifically, please provide links to all of the websites or social media accounts or other channels you will use.
